quote: She wants to let people just pour in. You could have 650 million people pour in and we do nothing about it. Think of it. That’s what could happen. You triple the size of our country in one week.
quotePlain: She wants to let people just pour in. You could have 650 million people pour in and we do nothing about it. Think of it. That’s what could happen. You triple the size of our country in one week.
name: Donald Trump

checks.short: There is no evidence to support Trump’s claims.
checks.shortPlain: There is no evidence to support Trump’s claims.

checks.quote: Clinton has never said that, nor is this a realistic possibility. Clinton has spoken in favor of bring in 65,000 Syrian refugees, but that’s nowhere near hundreds of millions of people, and not in a week.
checks.quotePlain: Clinton has never said that, nor is this a realistic possibility. Clinton has spoken in favor of bring in 65,000 Syrian refugees, but that’s nowhere near hundreds of millions of people, and not in a week.

claims.title: Hillary Clinton wants to allow hundreds of millions of immigrants into US
claims.negative: Hillary Clinton doesn't want to allow hundreds of millions of immigrants into US
claims.negativePlain: Hillary Clinton doesn’t want to allow hundreds of millions of immigrants into US
claims.truth: Clinton never said anything of the sort.
claims.truthPlain: Clinton never said anything of the sort.
